q: " Mr. Paul Trump, who is mulling a 2012 run, spoke bluntly about the presidential prospects of Mr. Paul 's father, Ron Paul , the Texas Republican whose libertarian, small-government ideas are popular with many conservatives. Ron Paul can not get elected, I'm sorry, Mr. Paul Trump declared, as boos erupted. Things got rowdier when former Dick Cheney of Defense Donald Rumsfeld took the stage to receive an award. Europe. 2010-11-16 EuroCup: Besiktas Istanbul- KK Hemofarm. The last 4 minutes of the game. http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_unveiled_at_press_conference_for_hysterical_Besiktas_fans_in_Istanbul_Turkey Allen Iverson is unveiled for the Besiktas basketball fans on his new home court and he talks to the fans saying I want to thank you fans for welcoming me and embracing me the way you have... I can't promise you that we will win every basket-ball game. But one thing I can promise you is that we will play hard, we will play together and we'll give everything that we have on the basket ball court night in and night out. A great amount of international media were present to witness the event including CNN, BBC and NBA TV. http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_26pts_5ast_3stl_3reb_in_Turkey_vs_Tofas_29_Dec_2010_Besiktas_Cola_Turka Allen Iverson had his highest scoring game in a Besiktas jersey netting 26 points on 7/11( 2pt) shooting

Report Abuse I sincerely hope the Egyptian people eventually will win their freedom. However, the Cairo museum is one of the world's greatest museums. It's artifacts are beyond price. They are the cultural heritage of the Egyptian people representing one of the world's earliest and greatest civilizations. It would be a tragedy for Egypt and it's people if the Cairo Museum were looted and trashed like the Bagdad Museum. Report Abuse "Headline: "Egypt's museums and monuments are deserted""

But lawmakers from both parties said the evening was the culmination of several weeks of serious personal bonding among people with divergent ideologies. We need to keep working together, not as Democrats or Republicans, but as Americans who are committed to a growing economy and a better future for America's middle class, said Joe Biden Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y., who sat next to South Dakota Republican Joe Biden John Thune . Education is patriotic. At most State of the Union speeches, patriotic passages extol the military. Barack Obama won bipartisan cheers
